Package: com.android.build.gradle.internal.core

[Java] Class GradleVariantConfiguration

      • com.android.build.gradle.internal.core.GradleVariantConfiguration

      • Version of VariantConfiguration that uses the specific types used in the Gradle plugins. It also adds support for Ndk support that is not ready to go in the builder library.

        • Constructor Summary

            Constructors 
            Constructor and description
            GradleVariantConfiguration (ProductFlavor defaultConfig, com.android.builder.model.SourceProvider defaultSourceProvider, BuildType buildType, com.android.builder.model.SourceProvider buildTypeSourceProvider, VariantType type, com.android.builder.model.SigningConfig signingConfigOverride)
            Creates a GradleVariantConfiguration for a normal (non-test) variant.
            GradleVariantConfiguration (VariantConfiguration testedConfig, ProductFlavor defaultConfig, com.android.builder.model.SourceProvider defaultSourceProvider, BuildType buildType, com.android.builder.model.SourceProvider buildTypeSourceProvider, VariantType type, com.android.builder.model.SigningConfig signingConfigOverride)
            Creates a GradleVariantConfiguration for a testing variant.

          • @com.android.annotations.NonNull @Override public VariantConfiguration addProductFlavor(@com.android.annotations.NonNull GroupableProductFlavor productFlavor, @com.android.annotations.NonNull com.android.builder.model.SourceProvider sourceProvider, @com.android.annotations.NonNull String dimensionName)

          • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public NdkConfig getNdkConfig()

          • @com.android.annotations.Nullable public Set<String> getSupportedAbis()

            Returns the ABI filters associated with the artifact, or null if there are no filters. If the list contains values, then the artifact only contains these ABIs and excludes others.

          • public boolean getUseJack()

          • public boolean isMinifyEnabled()

            Returns whether the configuration has minification enabled.
